EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Patrick Schoof (1369772305.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Patrick Schoof (1369772305.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Patrick, It’s good to hear from you. I wanted to follow up on your message below and my voicemail. MBO is an alternative to incorporating so there is no need to file any legal documentation. However, if you would like to ensure that no one can use the name “Intrinsic Matters” it may be worthwhile to get it as a DBA, but no legal entity would need to be created. Once you are a member we do have a networking community called “MBO Access <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>” where you can promote your skills and potentially hook up with other MBO members. I also see you are using the LinkedIn Group which is great. Give me a ring when you have a few moments to discuss. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Patrick Schoof [mailto:pschoof@gmail.com] Sent: Sunday, May 26, 2013 2:54 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Patrick Schoof Hello Sara,
I have the potential of working with a consulting firm that would like me to sign their NDA.
First, if I were to work with them through MBO Partners, what would first need to be done on my part to be operating separate from self employment? Does Intrinsic Matters need a DBA, Incorporated status, other?
Second, how would you recommend that I promote availability to other MBO Partners throughout your network?
If this can be done well, and soon, I am now able and willing to become very active?
Patrick --Patrick J. Schoof Direct at +1 240 620 5526 www.linkedin.com/in/patrickschoof <http://www.linkedin.com/in/patrickschoof> On Sat, Apr 27, 2013 at 11:53 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello Patrick, I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going. We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MzgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYzOCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjE4NTImc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyODI2MjYmZW1haWxpZD1wc2Nob29mQGdtYWlsLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjYyMDktMTQ5NDIwNS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUpW6ezlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028 <tel:%28703%29%20793-6028>f: 703-793-6070 <tel:703-793-6070>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MzgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYzOCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjE4NTImc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyODI2MjYmZW1haWxpZD1wc2Nob29mQGdtYWlsLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjYyMDktMTQ5NDIwNS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUpW6ezlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
